title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, January 8, 2021
description: It’s the birthday of physicist and author Stephen Hawking (1942) who beat the odds of life with ALS, surviving for 55 years and publishing more than 20 books.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of physicist and author Stephen Hawking (1942) who beat the odds of life with ALS, surviving for 55 years and publishing more than 20 books.
